### 7. â° **Time Blocking with Drag & Drop**

**Schedule your day visually!**

**How it works:**
- Drag any task to Morning (8-10 AM), Midday (10-12 PM), or Afternoon (2-5 PM) blocks
- Tasks appear in their assigned time block in the sidebar
- Click Ã— to remove from time block
- Persists across sessions

**Why it's amazing:**
- Visual daily schedule at a glance
- Match tasks to your energy levels
- Time-awareness without rigid scheduling
- Perfect for ADHD executive function support

**ADHD Benefits:**
- See your day laid out visually
- Plan around peak energy times
- Flexible (not rigid calendar)
- Easy to reschedule

### 8. âŒ¨ï¸ **Enhanced Keyboard Shortcuts**

**Navigate without touching your mouse!**

**10+ Shortcuts:**
- `Ctrl+B` - Open Brain Dump
- `Ctrl+T` - Start Focus Timer
- `Ctrl+E` - Energy Check
- `Ctrl+M` - Log Medication
- `Ctrl+W` - Weekly Review
- `Ctrl+N` - Add to Today
- `Ctrl+F` - Focus Search
- `Escape` - Close any modal
- `Enter` - Submit forms
- `?` - Show keyboard help

**Help Modal:**
- Press `?` anytime to see all shortcuts
- Beautiful visual reference guide
- Organized by category
- Styled `<kbd>` tags for clarity

**Why it's amazing:**
- Faster workflow
- Less mouse dependency
- Muscle memory shortcuts
- Power user friendly

**ADHD Benefits:**

### 10. ğŸ”„ **Recurring Tasks**

**Set it and forget it!**

**Patterns:**
- **Daily** - Repeats every day
- **Weekly** - Select specific days (Mon, Wed, Fri, etc.)
- **Monthly** - Select day of month (1-31)

**How it works:**
1. Click ğŸ”„ button on any task
2. Select pattern (Daily/Weekly/Monthly)
3. Configure details (days, date, etc.)
4. Save
5. When you complete task, next occurrence auto-creates!

**Visual Indicators:**
- ğŸ”„ Blue badge shows pattern type
- Clear in-task indication
- Set once, works forever

**Advanced:**
- Edit recurrence anytime
- Remove recurrence (set to "None")
- Next occurrence copies all properties:
  - Category, priority, time
  - Notes, subtasks
  - Time block assignment
- Creates with new unique ID

**Why it's amazing:**
- Automates routine tasks
- No manual re-creation
- Customizable patterns
- Flexible scheduling

**ADHD Benefits:**
- Less manual work
- Routines made easy
- Won't forget recurring tasks
- Supports habit building
- Reduces planning overhead

**Perfect For:**
- Daily medication
- Weekly planning
- Monthly bills
- Exercise routines
- Cleaning schedules
- Recurring meetings

## ğŸ’¡ How to Use Phase 2 Features Together

### Morning Routine:
1. `Ctrl+E` - Check energy level
2. `Ctrl+N` - Add top 3 tasks for today
3. Drag tasks to Morning/Midday/Afternoon blocks
4. `Ctrl+T` - Start first focus session

### During Day:
- `Ctrl+F` - Quick search when brain is foggy
- Click ğŸ“ to add notes/links to tasks
- Complete recurring tasks (auto-creates next!)
- Drag between time blocks as energy changes

### Evening:
- `Ctrl+W` - Weekly review (once a week)
- Mark tasks complete
- Check off recurring habits
- Plan tomorrow's ONE thing

### Anytime:
- `?` - Show shortcuts when you forget
- ğŸ”„ Set recurring for routines
- ğŸ“ Add notes when context is fresh

---

## ğŸ”¥ Power User Tips

### Time Blocking Strategy:
- Morning: High-priority creative work (peak energy)
- Midday: Meetings and collaboration (social energy)
- Afternoon: Admin and low-stakes tasks (declining energy)

### Keyboard Shortcut Mastery:
- Practice `Ctrl+B` for brain dumps (fast capture)
- Use `Ctrl+F` instead of scrolling
- `?` is your friend when learning

### Task Notes Best Practices:
- Add links immediately (won't remember later)
- Note "why" not just "what"
- Include names/contacts if relevant
- Capture next steps

### Recurring Task Patterns:
- Daily: Medication, journaling, exercise
- Weekly: Laundry (Sun), Planning (Mon), Review (Fri)
- Monthly: Bills, checkups, deep cleaning

## ğŸ“ Technical Details

### File Size:
- Phase 2 version: ~115KB (was 98KB)
- Still single HTML file
- No dependencies
- Works offline

### New Functions Added:
- `dropOnTimeBlock()` - Time block drops
- `renderTimeBlocks()` - Display scheduled tasks
- `showKeyboardHelp()` - Shortcuts modal
- `toggleTaskNotes()` - Notes expand/collapse
- `saveTaskNotes()` - Auto-save notes
- `openRecurrenceModal()` - Config recurrence
- `saveRecurrence()` - Save pattern
- `createNextOccurrence()` - Auto-create recurring

### Data Structure Updates:
```javascript
task = {
  // Phase 1 fields
  id, text, completed, created,
  priority, category, time,
  subtasks: [],

  // Phase 2 additions
  timeBlock: 'morning' | 'midday' | 'afternoon' | null,
  notes: 'string',
  recurrence: {
    pattern: 'daily' | 'weekly' | 'monthly',
    daysOfWeek: [0-6], // for weekly
    dayOfMonth: 1-31    // for monthly
  } | null
}
```

### Browser Compatibility:
- âœ… Chrome/Edge (best experience)
- âœ… Firefox (full support)
- âœ… Safari (full support)
- âœ… Mobile browsers (touch-friendly)
